---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk update checkouts by IDs"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/checkouts/ids/update"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates specific checkout records identified by their IDs. Use this when you have a known list of checkout records that need targeted updates without running a broader query.

**Prerequisites**
1. **AssetCheckoutIds** - Collect from [POST /api/v1.0/assets/checkouts/query/get](/docs/api/assets/get-asset-checkouts-by-query) or [POST /api/v1.0/assets/checkouts/transactions/query/get](/docs/api/assets/get-asset-checkout-transactions).

**Workflow Example**
1. Gather the checkout IDs requiring updates.
2. [POST /api/v1.0/assets/checkouts/ids/update](/docs/api/assets/update-asset-checkouts-by-ids) with an array of update objects including `AssetCheckoutId` and the fields to change.

**Minimal Required Fields**: request body array entries that include `AssetCheckoutId` plus the fields to update.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","description":"Checkout update requests keyed by AssetCheckoutId.","items":{"type":"object","description":"Update payload for an individual checkout record.","allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Represents a checkout record for an asset, including ownership, quantities, and timing data.","properties":{"AssetCheckoutId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the checkout record."},"AssetId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the checked-out asset."},"ParentAssetId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Parent asset identifier for non-serialized checkouts.","nullable":true},"CheckoutDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp when the asset was checked out."},"CheckinDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp when the asset was checked in, if returned.","nullable":true},"QuantityCheckedOut":{"type":"number","description":"Quantity issued in the checkout."},"QuantityCheckedIn":{"type":"number","description":"Quantity returned against this checkout."},"AsOfQuantityOutstanding":{"type":"number","description":"Outstanding quantity at the time of retrieval."},"DueDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Due date for the checkout, when applicable.","nullable":true},"IsDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates whether the checkout record has been deleted."},"ToEntityTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Entity type receiving the asset (user, team, etc.).","nullable":true},"ToEntityId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Entity identifier receiving the asset.","nullable":true},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Product context for the checkout."},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Site context for the checkout."},"CheckedOutByUserId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"User who performed the checkout."},"CheckedOutByUser":{"nullable":true,"allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Simplified user object containing essential identification information. Maps to C# `Spark.Shared.Models.SimpleUser`.","properties":{"UserId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the user."},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Site identifier the user belongs to."},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Full name of the user (computed from FirstName + LastName)."},"FullName":{"type":"string","description":"Full name of the user (computed from FirstName + LastName)."},"Initials":{"type":"string","description":"User initials (computed from first letter of FirstName and LastName)."},"FirstName":{"type":"string","description":"First name of the user."},"LastName":{"type":"string","description":"Last name of the user."},"Email":{"type":"string","format":"email","description":"Email address of the user."},"Username":{"type":"string","description":"Username for authentication."},"SchoolIdNumber":{"type":"string","description":"School identification number."},"Grade":{"type":"string","description":"Grade level of the user (for students)."},"Homeroom":{"type":"string","description":"Homeroom assignment (for students)."},"LocationId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Primary location/school ID for the user."},"LocationName":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the user's primary location."},"Location":{"type":"object","description":"Simplified location object.","properties":{"LocationId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"Name":{"type":"string"}}},"PhotoId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Profile photo file identifier."},"RoleId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Role identifier for the user."},"RoleName":{"type":"string","description":"Human-readable role name."},"Role":{"type":"object","description":"Simplified role object.","properties":{"RoleId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"Name":{"type":"string"}}},"IsOnline":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the user is currently online."},"IsOnlineLastUpdated":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","nullable":true,"description":"Timestamp when online status was last updated."},"AuthenticatedBy":{"type":"string","description":"Authentication provider (e.g., 'Local', 'SAML', 'Google')."},"IsEmailVerified":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the user's email address has been verified."},"UserStatusId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"User status type identifier (e.g., active, shell user)."},"ProfilePicturePath":{"type":"string","description":"URL path to the user's profile picture."}},"example":{"UserId":"51c89694-ae9f-f011-8e61-6045bd7991ab","SiteId":"bb6cece8-e4f4-e511-a789-005056bb000e","Name":"iiQ User","FirstName":"iiQ","LastName":"User","Email":"demo@incidentiq.com","Username":"demo@incidentiq.com","LocationId":"cc7dede9-f5f5-e622-b89a-116167cc111f","LocationName":"IncidentIQ Demo High School","RoleId":"d4e5f6a7-8901-2345-6789-0abcdef12345","RoleName":"Student","IsOnline":false,"IsEmailVerified":true},"title":"SimpleUser"}],"type":"object"},"Source":{"type":"string","description":"Source label for the transaction (UI, automation, etc.).","nullable":true},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Last modification timestamp for the checkout."}},"required":["AssetCheckoutId","AssetId","CheckoutDate","QuantityCheckedOut","ProductId","SiteId","CheckedOutByUserId","ModifiedDate"],"title":"AssetCheckout"}],"title":"UpdateAssetCheckoutRequest"},"title":"UpdateAssetCheckoutsByIdsRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
